title: Surface Vessel Intercept (Training)
objective: Escort convoy ship red-01 safely across sector; training shot optional.
captain_summary: Training mission. You will shadow a single surface contact (red-01) and practice contact management and weapons procedures. Maintain EMCON; take a training shot when safe.
roe: Weapons release authorized for training shot.
Minimize active sonar to preserve EMCON.
ai_fleet_prompt: You are a fleet commander. In this mission you command a surface vessel red-01. Your mission is to get red-01 safely to grid 100,100. There is a rumor of an enemy submarine operating in the area. Issue prudent, doctrine-aligned guidance.

ai_ship_prompts.red-01: You are red-01, a surface vessel. You receive orders from the Fleet Commander. Execute guidance to reach grid 100,100 while maintaining prudent seamanship and avoiding threats.

triggers.comms: INFO: Surface contact maintaining 5 kn on easterly course.
